chat_history.message: Hello, I have a problem with my iPhone 12. I'd like to change the delivery address without canceling the order. Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

The customer make a change without going through the cancellation.

Is this possible?

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Heritinasoa-Fenitriniaina Back Market customer Care

Hello ecomobile,

Please ship this order to this address:

Via Giotto n.22 Terralba CAP 09098 (OR), Sardegna, Italia

Thank you for your kind cooperation,

Heritinasoa-Fenitriniaina from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the change of address.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

Please confirm if the address change was successful.

According to the tracking link, the package destination is still in Cagliari.

Thank you for understanding,
Heritinasoa-Fenitriniaina from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have sucessfully confirmed the change of address with our logistics partner

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile, 

It seems that the package is delivered to Cagliari, we have already given you the right address and we have confirmed that this is indeed changed within UPS.

If the client has not received it, I will return to you.

Sincerely,

Heritinasoa-Fenitriniaina from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Any updates of parcel confirmation from the customer's side? If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you. 

Regards,
YL
